name: eggd_ici_uploader
title: eggd_ici_uploader
summary: Uploads genomic data files to the Illumina Connected Insights (ICI) platform

inputSpec.name: run_folder
inputSpec.label: Run Folder
inputSpec.help: Path to folder containing pipeline output. The directory structure *must* match the directory tree specification outlined in the workflow definition - log into ICI and consult the manual for further details.

inputSpec.name: api_key
inputSpec.label: API Key
inputSpec.help: File containing user's API key (i.e. access credentials). Log in to ICI and view the manual for guidance on generating an API key.

inputSpec.name: workflow
inputSpec.label: Workflow
inputSpec.help: Name of ICI upload workflow. Workflow details are stored at the settings page on the ICI platform - please log in to ICI and view the settings page for details.
